name: Nairobi National Park
description: The only national park in the world located within a capital city, offering incredible wildlife viewing opportunities against the backdrop of Nairobi's skyline.

name: Giraffe Centre
description: An iconic conservation and education center where visitors can interact with endangered Rothschild's giraffes.

name: Karen Blixen Museum
description: The former home of 'Out of Africa' author Karen Blixen, now a museum showcasing colonial life in Kenya.

name: David Sheldrick Wildlife Trust
description: A world-renowned orphan elephant rescue and rehabilitation program, offering a unique chance to see baby elephants being fed.

name: Bomas of Kenya
description: Experience the rich cultural diversity of Kenya through traditional homesteads, dances, and music from various ethnic groups.

name: Nairobi CBD & Skyscrapers
description: The bustling heart of the city, home to modern skyscrapers, major businesses, and vibrant street life.

name: Village Market
description: A premier shopping, recreation, and entertainment complex, offering a wide array of international and local brands, restaurants, and activities.

name: Karura Forest
description: An urban forest offering a serene escape with walking trails, waterfalls, and a rich biodiversity, perfect for outdoor activities.
